english.segment1: Underneath the shadow. Underneath the shadow. Underneath the shadow of Your ways. Lord and King. Cover me
english.segment2: I rejoice, I rejoice, I rejoice, I rejoice. in You, in You I rejoice in You. in You, in You I rejoice in You
english.segment3: Underneath the shadow. Underneath the shadow. Underneath the shadow of the the Cross. You bore the cost. and Death is lost
english.segment4: I rejoice, I rejoice, I rejoice, I rejoice. in You, in You I rejoice in You. in You, in You, I rejoice in You
english.segment5: Your arms spread out like eagle's wings. His love lays out a wedding feast. your body and your blood. and now we have become. your sons and your daughters
english.segment6: in You, in You, I rejoice in You. in You, in You, I rejoice in You
